argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | m2cpm.s | |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | m2cpm.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 3 |  | m2cpm.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | m2cpm.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | m2cpmghm.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | m2cpmghm.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 7 |  | m2cpmghm.u | |- U = ( C |`s S ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 9 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 | #P_mat2pmatghm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom C ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 5, 6 | #P_cpmatsubgpmat | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> S e. ( SubGrp ` C ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_m2cpmf | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : B --> S ) |
| 12 |  | #P_frn | |- ( T : B --> S -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ran T C_ S ) |
| 14 | 7 | #P_resghm2b | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` C ) /\ ran T C_ S ) -> ( T e. ( A GrpHom C ) <-> T e. ( A GrpHom U ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_bicomd | |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` C ) /\ ran T C_ S ) -> ( T e. ( A GrpHom U ) <-> T e. ( A GrpHom C ) ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 13, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( T e. ( A GrpHom U ) <-> T e. ( A GrpHom C ) ) ) |
| 17 | 9, 16 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom U ) ) |
